description: Infill at ground floor level to provide one retail (A1) unit and 3 units for A1/A2 use with ancillary storage at mezzanine level and one A1 kiosk unit (total floorspace 645sq.m.);use of basement for storage of documents (2 844sq.m.);restaurant/wine bar (A3) (185sq.m) and leisure use (D2) (782sq.m.);refurbishment of shopping mall and relocation of public conveniences from basement to ground floor level (application amended by letter).  APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS:2609/3D 2E 20B 21C 22C 24C 27 28A 32
decision_conditions: The proposal would result in an overintensification of use of the site, in particular by A3 and D2 uses, to the detriment of the amenities of adjacent residential property.
